name: Steve DiGiambattista
bio: Steve DiGiambattista is a tech professional who began his software engineering career as an IBM zOS Mainframe devleloper, coding business applications in COBOL, CICS and DB2.  Steve's professional career led him into Software Quality Engineering where he quickly transitioned into leadership and management, specializing in building SQE manual and automation teams and processes from the ground up.  In 2023 Steve pivoted back to software engineering, entering into a Software Engineeting Immersive bootcamp, where he freshened his dev skillset, focusing on modern day technologies, languages and frameworks.  In his free time Steve enjoys traveling, winter outdoor activities and motorcycle riding.
